  • Constructor Details

    • MercatorProjection

      public MercatorProjection​(GraphStatistics.BoundingBox boundingBox, int maxSize)
      Create a new MercatorProjection corresponding to the given BoundingBox and maxSize.
      Parameters:
      boundingBox - Box for this projection.
      maxSize - Maximum size of any side (width / height) of the image to which this projection should draw.
